703188f-b.text:
Belt Parkway, south from Bay Parkway, along the shore of Gravesend Bay.  The area seen in these views was later filled with sand from the Bay and the new circumferential highway, which will girdle Brooklyn and Queens, constructed on the fill.  Views 2 and 3 show the Senken Coal Company pockets, at Bay 32nd Street.

May 28, 1930
Views 1,2,3

P.L. Sperr
703188f-b.folder: Shore Parkway & Bay Parkway, Brooklyn, NY
